Description: Located in the Tufts area of Somerville convenient to Teele Square and the Davis Square T station on the Red Line. This is a 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment on the 2nd floor of a three unit house with hardwood floors throughout. Eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and pantry. Coin operated laundry is on site. Back porch and shared yard. (Reference #141869)
